unnormalised: Hey guys, any update on Jadeja's knee? Remember that nasty fall during the Ranji Trophy match? Hoping he recovers soon, like SRK in *Kal Ho Naa Ho*! We need him for the upcoming T20 World Cup. Heard Bumrah is doing rehab at NCA. Any news on his workload? Praying for their speedy recovery! #TeamIndia
